metadata.description: Productivity skills for CLI tools and workflows

plugins.name: memrise
plugins.description: Operate the Memrise CLI for community courses, including authentication setup, course/level/word lookup, pool searches, and adding items

plugins.name: tripit
plugins.description: Operate and validate the TripIt CLI for trip and itinerary workflows, including CRUD operations for trips, hotels, flights, transport, activities, and document attachments
